title: Pre-Release Alpha Client

embed.description: The client is the hub of the League experience. It's where you get news, talk with friends, fiddle with runes and masteries, and queue up for your next game. The launch of the alpha marks the first step on a journey.

body:
Has anyone actually been accepted to join the pre-release for the alpha client? I send my request in like a couple hours after it came out and it is still pending.


{{champion:107}}

replies.body: I signed up around a month ago but I haven't heard anything.
i signed up when they originally asked months ago and got accepted when it first released.
I signed up last week and got accepted two days later
